summary: This bill, known as the Delivering Elderly Lunches and Increasing Volunteer Engagement and Reimbursements Act of 2025 (DELIVER Act of 2025), aims to amend the Internal Revenue Code. The primary focus is to increase the standard charitable mileage rate for volunteers delivering meals to elderly, disabled, frail, and at-risk individuals. The amendment would apply the standard business mileage rate, as specified by the IRS, for expenses related to these deliveries.
